title: Les Moissonneurs dans Les Marais Pontins
marks:
Signature, Inscription and Stamp

LRC, printed v LLC, in the print: [LEOPOLD ROBERT / ROME 1830.]
description: cart pulled by two oxen at center, with man with staff leaning on PR ox; man wearing hat seated on ox at right; two men and a woman carrying a baby ride in cart; bagpiper and man dancing with scythe at right; three girls with bundle of grain at left, with pair of men behind them
